name: Easter POP Eggs! Dx
description:
Choco the Easter Bunny is preparing for the holiday, but finds that someone has stolen and scattered her eggs! 

She has to find all the stolen eggs... And fast, or else there's no Easter to be had!

Easter POP Eggs Deluxe is a remake of a minigame I made for easter a few years back -- made in the same timespan as that game, no less! With all new graphics and music, I hope you enjoy this version too!

Music by lilkevo303 (ancientorigin)!
